titleStmt.title: The shield of the righteous: or, The Ninety first Psalme, expounded, with the addition of doctrines and vses Verie necessarie and comfortable in these dayes of heauinesse, wherein the pestilence rageth so sore in London, and other parts of this kingdome. By Robert Horn, minister of Gods Word.
titleStmt.author: Horne, Robert, 1565-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by G. Miller] for Philemon Stephens and Christopher Meredith, and are to be sold at their shop at the golden Lyon in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The shield of the righteous in this time of sicknesse and mortality.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
